cocktailOfTheMonth.name: Margarita
cocktailOfTheMonth.directions: Add all ingredients to shaker. Add ice. Shake for 10-20 seconds until very cold. Double strain into chilled rocks glass over ice.

gin.name: Negroni
gin.directions: Add all ingredients to shaker. Add ice. Shake for 10-20 seconds until very cold. Double strain into chilled rocks glass over ice.

tequila.name: Margarita
tequila.directions: Add all ingredients to shaker. Add ice. Shake for 10-20 seconds until very cold. Double strain into chilled rocks glass over ice.

whiskey.name: Mint Julep
whiskey.directions: Add 2 sprigs worth of mint leaves to glass. Add sugar. Add 1/4 oz water, or a bit of the whiskey. Muddle the mint lightly to release the essential oils and aromas. Add whiskey. Pack cup with crushed ice. Add remaining sprig of mint for garnish.

whiskey.name: Old Fashioned
whiskey.directions: Add sugar cube to glass. Cover sugar cube with Bitters. Use back end of a bar spoon to mash and dissolve sugar cube. Add whiskey and stir slightly. Add 2-3 ice cubes. Stir until glass is very cold. Garnish with orange peel.

whiskey.name: Old Pal
whiskey.directions: Add all ingredients to shaker. Add ice. Shake for 10-20 seconds until very cold. Double strain into chilled cocktail glass.

whiskey.name: Scofflaw
whiskey.directions: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

whiskey.name: Whiskey Sour
whiskey.directions: Add sugar, lemon juice, whiskey, and egg white to shaker. Dry shake for about 10-15 seconds. Add ice to shaker. Shake for 1 minute. Double strain into glass.

whiskey.name: Whiskey Sour Alt
whiskey.directions: Add all ingredients to shaker. Add ice. Shake for 10-20 seconds until very cold. Double strain into chilled rocks glass over ice.

whiskey.name: Whiskey Stone Sour
whiskey.directions: Add all ingredients to shaker. Add ice. Shake for 10-20 seconds until very cold. Double strain into chilled rocks glass over ice.

whiskey.name: Tishman
whiskey.directions: Add all ingredients to shaker, except club soda. Add ice. Shake for 10-20 seconds until very cold. Double strain into chilled rocks glass over ice. Top with club soda.
